description: An app to help you capture thoughts & ideas, syncs with self-hosted Memos server Moe Memos is an app to help you capture thoughts and ideas. To use this app, you must have a self-hosted Memos server set up and running. Find out more at https://github.com/usememos/memos Features: - Write memos like tweeting to yourself - Sync with your own Memos server - Material You design with dynamic themes and themed icon - Markdown, image, and to-do item support - Group memos with tags - Pin and search memos - View your progress with a graph - Save texts, images and webpages from share sheet - Full privacy protection, no data collection
